title: smartbay-marine-types
summary: AI-based Marine animal types detection and classification algorithm based on YOLOv8. The model has been tuned to detect and classify marine animal types at the Smartbay underwater observatory
description: smartbay-marine-types is an application using the DEEPaaS API.
AI-based Marine animal types detection and classification algorithm based on YOLOv8. The model has been tuned to detect and classify marine animal types at the Smartbay underwater observatory
